post_detail.description:
Challenge: 
As part of Mountain Dew's art campaign, the Pepsi Co. subsidary got together with NuAmerica, BET, and Click 3X to create an online video. 
        
Execution: 
The project featured the artists selected by Mountain Dew to design the new aluminum bottle labels. Our animations were tailored specifically to celebrate each artist in their own style.
post_detail.title: Mountain Dew
